response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this item holds a significant importance to me, reflecting not just its monetary value but also its unique attributes and the story behind it. Considering these factors, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1,200,000. This offer is tailored to reflect the substantial value you would derive from it, while also ensuring a fair return on my investment. I believe this price is a win-win proposition for both of us. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
